metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27545 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: libdwarf before 20201017 has a one-byte out-of-bounds read because of an invalid pointer dereference via an invalid line table in a crafted object.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
